name: Interlopr - teaser demo
description:
Project Arin: Interlopr is a puzzle platformer adventure game where you control a mutant with the power to possess any living organism. You are awoken in an underground facility in ruins by an unknown voice, you must traverse your way around the hostile post apocalyptic city in hopes of finding out who you are, and what your purpose is.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my vision/reimagining of what Project Arin could have been. I was a programmer for the original demo version of the game. The team that was working on the full version of the Project Arin game was not successful in creating it due to various personal and external reasons. This game was to be my first ever full fledged game.

So I took it upon myself to try to do my own take on the game.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a teaser demo that I made in a week. Everything except all the music and sound effects are original, by me.

The original Project Arin demo: https://www.projectarin.com

This game will not come out, at least, in the near future.
